bioAsHtml: Abdelhamide is a Data engineer at @Ebiznext, working on building Big Data systems mainly using Scala, Kafka, Spark, Elastic stack. Currently, he's focusing more and more on the "pure" functional programming using Scala.

acceptedTalks.title: Retour d’expérience Realtime Data Pipeline :  Kafka Streams / Kafka Connect versus Spark Streaming

bio:
Abdelhamide is a Data engineer at @Ebiznext, working on building Big Data systems mainly using Scala, Kafka, Spark, Elastic stack.
Currently, he's focusing more and more on the "pure" functional programming using Scala.
